special_abilities.desc: The hippogriff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
special_abilities.name: Keen Sight

actions.desc: The hippogriff makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws
